subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The American Taylor Phinney won the first stage of the Giro d’Italia, a 5.4-mile individual time trial in Herning, Denmark, on Saturday.
snippet: The American Taylor Phinney won the first stage of the Giro d’Italia, a 5.4-mile individual time trial in Herning, Denmark, on Saturday.
